<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/users/me/addresses/{addressId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



指定された住所IDの情報を更新します。


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"addressId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"住所ID","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"660f9511-f3ac-52e5-b827-557766551111"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"firstName":{"type":"string","example":"太郎"},"lastName":{"type":"string","example":"山田"},"phoneNumber":{"type":"string","example":"090-1234-5678"},"postalCode":{"type":"string","example":"100-0001"},"prefecture":{"type":"string","example":"東京都"},"city":{"type":"string","example":"千代田区"},"addressLine1":{"type":"string","example":"丸の内1-1-1"},"addressLine2":{"type":"string","example":"丸の内ビル 10F"},"isDefault":{"type":"boolean","example":false}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
